heading: Thursday Night
text: Showers likely early, then slight chance in the south, scattered and diminishing north, with snow or a wintry mix possible over the mountain summits. Lows from the mid 30s to around 40, except low to mid 40s near Lake Champlain. Winds becoming west 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Friday
text: Partly cloudy to mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower southeast, otherwise morning showers developing from the northern Greens westward, with a rising chance elsewhere, mainly after noon; snow or wintry mix possible over the summits. Valley highs from the mid 40s to around 50 north, and low to mid 50s in the south. West winds 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Friday Night
text: Partly cloudy in southern valleys. Periods of clouds north and in the southern mountains, with evening rain or mountain snow showers diminishing. Lows from the upper 20s to mid 30s, except mid to upper 30s near Lake Champlain. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph.
